title: Build breaks with a clean nuget cache
body:
Building on the xplat branch with a non-existing nuget cache fails with a missing dependency: Microsoft.NETCore.Portable.Compatibility 1.0.1-beta-23405

The work-around is to run: 
`nuget restore src\.nuget\packages.config`

nodes.body: We worked around this and the problem will go away when we adopt the new SDK.
